widget.name: Google Maps Polygon
widget.description: Displaying and editing Polygons within your Mendix application

property.caption: Height
property.description: The map's height in pixels. Setting it to 10000 will set it to 100 of the view height and resize it dynamically when zooming.

property.caption: Width
property.description: The map's width in pixels. Setting it to 10000 will set it to 100 % of the width of the screen and will resize it dynamically when zooming.

property.caption: Maps API Access Key
property.description: For using in Production, a Google Maps API key will be needed. For development purposes it can be left empty, but will generate text overlays 'For development purposes only' by Google

property.caption: Map Type
property.description: Set the default map type

property.caption: Default Latitude
property.description: Default latitude for the map to start at.

property.caption: Default Longitude
property.description: Default longitude for the map to start at.

property.caption: Dynamic Default Location
property.description: If enabled, the default location will be retrieved via below configured 'Default Location' data source.

property.caption: Latitude attribute
property.description: The latitude attribute.

property.caption: Longtitude attribute
property.description: The longtitude attribute.

property.caption: Draggable in Edit mode
property.description: If objects are editable, objects will also be draggable if this option is set to 'Yes'. Be carefull with this setting, since if a Polygon consists of thousands of points, dragging triggers an event for each changed point. The page will be performing badly with such an action...

property.caption: Overrule single item zoom level
property.description: When set to 'No' Google determines the right zoom level to fit the shape in, if set to 'Yes' the zoom level you set at 'Single item zoom level' is used.

property.caption: Single item zoom level
property.description: The zoom level used when displaying a single item. 1 is the whole world, 15 is city level, 20 is house level.

property.caption: Hole Coordinates
property.description: Select the attribute that holds the coordinates of the Polygon

property.caption: Coordinates
property.description: Select the attribute that holds the coordinates of the Polygon

property.caption: Coordinates (for updates)
property.description: Select the attribute that holds the coordinates here again, in case updating of the Polygon/Line from the UI needs to be supported. This is needed because of a current bug in the pluggable widgets API, not being able to update attributes of objects retrieved via datasource.

property.caption: Reverse Coordinates
property.description: The attribute that decides whether the input coordinates should be reversed. Will turn (Lat, Lng) into (Lng, Lat) pairs.

property.caption: Color
property.description: The hexadecimal color of the object. It should start with a '#'.

property.caption: Stroke Weight
property.description: The weight of the border of the Polygon / Polyline.

property.caption: Stroke Opacity
property.description: The Polygon / Polyline opacity between 0.0 and 1.0. The value 0.0 means completely opaque / not visible. Defaults to 1.0.

property.caption: Type
property.description: The attribute determining to plot a Polyline or Polygon. Needs an enumeration with these two values.

property.caption: Line Type
property.description: The type of line. Supported are: Normal, Dashed and Dotted.

property.caption: InfoWindow widget
property.description: This widget will be shown in the marker info bubble. (Not required)

property.caption: Disable infowindow on click
property.description: When set to true the on click microflow will directly be triggered in stead of via the infowindow.

property.caption: When infowindow itself is disabled, this on click action, if configured, will be called directly
Drag
property.description: Enable/disable dragging a map using the mouse

property.caption: Type
property.description: Enable/disable Map Type control

property.caption: Scroll
property.description: Enable/disable using the scrollwheel to zoom in/out

property.caption: Streetview
property.description: Enable/disable Streetview control

property.caption: Zoom Control
property.description: Enable/disable Zoom control

property.caption: Tilt
property.description: Angle of the map. This can be set to 45 degrees, if this is available for some locations and only when using type Satellite or Hybrid. It will automatically switch to 0 degrees if it is not available.

property.caption: Style Array
property.description: Use this to add custom styles to your maps.
